name: Hair-and-Ball('Hair Loss')
description:
[Hair-and-Ball('Hair Loss')]

"Take off his hair using a hair dryer and a ball!!"

 - You can use the mouse to control the yaw.

* This game is made by Kang Sora as homework of Seoul institute of the arts's mixed reality programming class.
